subject: Re-run of failed test cases
msgSnippet: Hi Team, Can anybody help me out how to re-rerun the failed test cases either through Ant or Programmatic. Lets say i have 10 test cases in two different Java
messageBody:
Hi Team,

Can anybody help me out how to re-rerun the failed test cases either through Ant or Programmatic.
Lets say i have 10 test cases in two different Java Class files,when i run the suite,two test cases failed in each class file. I need to re-run only the failed test cases from that particular classes only not the entire classes again.

Thanks,
Jeevan.
